page.title: 09PUBLIC OPINION IN BRADWELL
page.content: We interviewed the general public to find out what they thought of Bradwell.Most of the people we interviewed lived in Bradwell although only two had been born in the village. Nearly everyone we spoke to enjoyed living in Bradwell. Things people liked were the peace and quiet and the friendly atmosphere. Most people used the local shops; the new supermarket being popular for its variety of food and spacious surroundings. People were equally divided in their opinion when we asked them if they would like to see more shops opened in the village. Those who wanted more shops felt they should be built on the new estates because the new houses were a long way from the village centre.
